item.description: Come check out dragon boating with Living Root! We're a co-ed dragon boat team and we're always looking for new paddlers to join us. This is a great way to get in shape, stay in shape, meet people, and do something fun and competitive.  We meet at 6 pm at the docks behind Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (125 Nashua Street, Boston), and practice runs until 8 pm.  Parking is available for $5 (tell the parking attendant that you are there to use the boats), and Spaulding is close to Science Park (Green Line), Charles/MGH (Red Line), or North Station (Orange Line).  We paddle rain or shine, so dress for the weather.  There are facilities in the hospital where you can get changed, and we can lock up anything you don't want to bring with you on the boat.  Bring a bottle of water, and we'll provide all the paddling equipment you'll need.  We often head out for a quick bite to eat after practice, and you're welcome to join us.  Send questions to: Dave Parker at dfitzparker@gmail.com [url=http://www.livingroot.org/]www.livingroot.org[/url]
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the tall guy with a paddle or a clipboard.
item.name: Dragon Boat Practice Session
